content.raw:
sim_api.cc segfaults for me when running the new test"


```
#!c++

[ RUN      ] SimApiTest.HxsAddRemoveConstraint
[Msg] Waiting for master.
[Msg] Connected to gazebo master @ http://127.0.0.1:11345
[Msg] Publicized address: 172.23.1.7
[Wrn] [ImuSensor.cc:92] Deprecation: IMU noise SDF value have changed. Please refer to http://sdformat.org/spec?ver=1.5&elem=sensor#sensor_imu
[Wrn] [ImuSensor.cc:92] Deprecation: IMU noise SDF value have changed. Please refer to http://sdformat.org/spec?ver=1.5&elem=sensor#sensor_imu
[Wrn] [ImuSensor.cc:92] Deprecation: IMU noise SDF value have changed. Please refer to http://sdformat.org/spec?ver=1.5&elem=sensor#sensor_imu
[Wrn] [ImuSensor.cc:92] Deprecation: IMU noise SDF value have changed. Please refer to http://sdformat.org/spec?ver=1.5&elem=sensor#sensor_imu
[Wrn] [ImuSensor.cc:92] Deprecation: IMU noise SDF value have changed. Please refer to http://sdformat.org/spec?ver=1.5&elem=sensor#sensor_imu
world name: [default]
[Wrn] [HaptixControlPlugin.cc:152] no polhemus_source model detected using predefine location.
[Dbg] [HaptixControlPlugin.cc:159] Polhemus Source Pose [-0.5 0 1.3 3.14159 0 -1.57159]
libusb_open_device_with_vid_pid() failed
Failed to connect to Polhemus
[Wrn] [HaptixControlPlugin.cc:323] No usable polhemus setup detected.
Successfully connected to keyboard node
[Dbg] [ServerFixture.cc:193] ServerFixture load in 1.5 seconds, timeout after 600 seconds
hxs_add_constraint executed.
[Wrn] [ODEJoint.cc:1065] Spring Damper for Joint[test_constraint] is not initialized because either parent[1] or child[0] is static.
INTEGRATION_sim_api: /usr/include/boost/smart_ptr/shared_ptr.hpp:653: typename boost::detail::sp_member_access<T>::type boost::shared_ptr<T>::operator->() const [with T = gazebo::physics::Model; typename boost::detail::sp_member_access<T>::type = gazebo::physics::Model*]: Assertion `px != 0' failed.
Aborted (core dumped)
```

It seems to segfault in the line `world->Step(1000)` after creating the new joint dynamically.

sim_api.cc segfaults for me when running the new test"

[ RUN      ] SimApiTest.HxsAddRemoveConstraint
[Msg] Waiting for master.

INTEGRATION_sim_api: /usr/include/boost/smart_ptr/shared_ptr.hpp:653: typename boost::detail::sp_member_access<T>::type boost::shared_ptr<T>::operator->() const [with T = gazebo::physics::Model; typename boost::detail::sp_member_access<T>::type = gazebo::physics::Model*]: Assertion `px != 0' failed.
Aborted (core dumped)

It seems to segfault in the line world->Step(1000) after creating the new joint dynamically.

content.raw: Possibly due to something about passing in shared pointer of the model itself to `CreateJoint` and ensuing constructors?
